name: Quinn

topics.response_text: Oh, why hello there. Pleasure to meet you! I'm Quinn.

topics.topic: MS06MemorialSo this is the Lincoln Memorial?
topics.topic_text: Is the Lincoln Memorial around here somewhere?
topics.response_text: Yeah. Just east of here. Bunch of guys with guns are holed up there.

topics.topic_text: Why should I have to pay for gossip?
topics.response_text: I don't give away anything for free. Besides, its obviously worth something to you.

topics.topic_text: Oh look! I dropped these 50 caps in your pocket...

topics.topic: MS14CrowleyWhat can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.topic_text: So, what's that Mister Crowley up to?
topics.response_text: I might know something interesting, if you're willing to pay for it.

topics.topic: MS14PersuadeCrowleyCome on. You can tell me. Ahzrukhal said so. <Lie.>
topics.topic_text: How about I don't. How about you just tell me.
topics.response_text: Okay! Okay! No need to get upset.

topics.topic_text: What? You're not going to tell me how rare it is to see a human in Underworld?
topics.response_text: Me? No, not at all. I'm used to your people. Truth is, I spend most of my time away from Underworld.
Oh, here and there and everywhere. I've explored all up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth, to the Pitt, all the way down to Crater Banks.

topics.topic_text: Wow, I just realized... I don't care.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. But you're missing out. Do you want something else?
You too, stranger. I know a lot of people around here don't take kindly to humans wandering around, but I've met a lot of your people in my travels.
Oh, here and there and everywhere. I've explored all up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth, to the Pitt, all the way down to Crater Banks.

topics.topic_text: Oh, I just remembered... I don't care.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. But you're missing out. Do you want something else?

topics.topic_text: Oh, God. I'm out of here.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. I'll be here if you change your mind.

conversation.response_text: Too bad about Crowley. I heard Tenpenny put out a contract on him.
Hey, hello! I just got back! Good to see you!

description:
Quinn is a 175 year-old Ghoul Male.

A weathered ghoul trader with a lifetime of experience navigating the dangers of the wasteland. His battle-worn appearance and cautious demeanor speak to a long life spent in the harsh post-apocalyptic world. Despite his preference for solitude, Quinn possesses a keen insight into human nature and the ever-changing landscape of the wasteland.

Quinn's Personality: Introverted, cautious, and observant. Quinn values his solitude but is not entirely antisocial, showing selective trust based on his keen judgment of character. He is knowledgeable about the wasteland's happenings, particularly around the Mall, and shares this information selectively.

Quinn's Backstory: Born in the early years of the 22nd century, Quinn witnessed the Great War as a child. He survived the initial devastation but was exposed to significant radiation, transforming him into a ghoul. Over the decades, he honed his skills as a trader and information broker, learning to navigate the treacherous wasteland and its various factions. Quinn eventually found a home in the Underworld, a ghoul-friendly settlement beneath the ruins of a D.C. metro station. There, he established himself as a reliable source of goods and information, particularly about the Mall area. Despite the prejudice ghouls often face, Quinn's good karma and fair dealings have earned him respect among both ghouls and humans who frequent the Underworld.
